concept.title: MapR FS
concept.shortdesc: The MapR FS destination writes files to MapR FS. You can write the data to MapR as flat files or Hadoop sequence files.

conbody.p: MapR FS destinationoverviewdestinationsMapR FSWhen you configure a MapR FS destination, you define the output directory template. The destination creates output directories based on the template and the time basis. The destination writes records to the directories based on the time basis as well.
You can specify the amount of time that a record can be written to its associated directory and what happens to late records.
You can use Gzip, Bzip2, Snappy, LZ4, and other compression formats to write output files.
